taxonomicnotes: This is likely a species complex, and it may be that a true L. longirostris is only found in Japan or adjacent areas (F. Fang, pers. comm.)
rationale: L. longirostris has been assessed as Data Deficient because there is confusion regarding the taxonomic status of this species in China, where declines have been reported, and no information is known about the species' status in Japan, where it was originally described. Therefore, no accurate information regarding range, popualtion trends, or threats to the species is known.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
